description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.  All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 19 January 2023 at 14:00 EST.  All bids submitted after 14:00
